data.comment: The match has started at Mestalla.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Real Madrid.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Real Madrid are coming forward and Marco Asensio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Denis Cheryshev (Valencia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Real Madrid at Mestalla.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid's Luka Modric is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 13, In Valencia, Real Madrid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) strikes at Mestalla but his header is cleared.
In the minute 17, Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 21, Free kick Real Madrid.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Goal! Real Madrid have got their heads in front thanks to a Karim Benzema strike.
In the minute 23, Marcelo instrumental with a fine assist.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Mestalla.
In the minute 28, Can Valencia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 29, Valencia have been awarded a penalty...
Throw-in high up the field for Valencia in Valencia.
Carlos Soler equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 38, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 41, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Carlos Soler (Valencia) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 42, Uros Racic is back on the pitch.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Real Madrid's area.
Uros Racic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Raphael Varane blunders with an own goal. This makes it 2-1.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Valencia.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 45, Real Madrid's Luka Modric gets in a shot on goal at Mestalla. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, In Valencia Real Madrid drive forward through Karim Benzema. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Kang In Lee hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Valencia!
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Valencia.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
In the minute 50, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valencia have been given a penalty...
At Mestalla, Marcelo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 54, Goal! The home team extend their lead to 3-1 thanks to a penalty from Carlos Soler.
Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia's Jose Luis Gaya misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Karim Benzema for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Mestalla. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Real Madrid's Vinicius Junior breaks free at Mestalla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 58, Jesus Gil Manzano awards Valencia a goal kick.
Real Madrid drives forward and Marco Asensio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Valencia have been awarded a penalty in Valencia...
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) has received a yellow card from Jesus Gil Manzano.
Valencia are going well in Valencia. They now lead 4-1 thanks to a Carlos Soler penalty.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 64, Zinedine Zidane is making the team's first substitution at Mestalla with Martin Odegaard replacing Vinicius Junior.
Rodrygo is replacing Marco Asensio for Real Madrid at Mestalla.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 65, Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Federico Valverde.
Real Madridâ€™s Federico Valverde is on his feet again at Mestalla.
In the minute 68, In Valencia Real Madrid attack through Lucas Vazquez. The finish is off target, however.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Valencia a goal kick.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Real Madrid's Federico Valverde gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 76, Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a third substitution, with Mariano Diaz replacing Karim Benzema.
The away team have replaced Federico Valverde with Toni Kroos. This is the fourth substitution made today by Zinedine Zidane.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 77, Real Madrid are pushing forward but Luka Modric's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Lato Toni is on a sub for Denis Cheryshev for Valencia.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Free kick Real Madrid.
In the minute 79, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Kang In Lee is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Kang In Lee (Valencia) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Kevin Gameiro.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Real Madrid.
Luka Jovic is replacing Isco for the away team.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Hugo Guillamon (Valencia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Jaume Domenech for Valencia has been booked by Jesus Gil Manzano and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jason is replacing Yunus Musah for Valencia at Mestalla.
The home team replace Maxi Gomez with Ruben Sobrino.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Real Madrid.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Luka Jovic for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jesus Gil Manzano awards Valencia a goal kick.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Mariano Diaz of Real Madrid gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid's Mariano Diaz attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Valencia.
Valencia needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
Jesus Gil Manzano signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 4-1.
